4.pT: Yureru hi no hana: Hi wo yobu shingi

6.pT: Sakareta kizuna Masamune kutsujoku no taikyaku

7.pT: Ryakudatsu no kyôyû! Sôryû gekka no shinken shôbu

9.pT: Kai no tora, Midaigawa ni shisu!

10.pT: Yukimura saikifunô!? Date-gun namida no kaisan!!

12.pT: Azuchi-jô tenshu ashita wo kaketa shitô!!

13.pT: Setouchi no Gekitotsu! Hi o Fuku Umi no Daiyosai-Fugaku!!

1.pT: Ransei futatabi! Rekkai butei Toyotomi Hideyoshi kourin!

2.pT: Rosuto migi me wa, Gashed doragon wa e modoru yo

3.pT: Tsukasa tai Toshiie! Tetorigawa de kanjo o fukutsu no chissoku!

4.pT: Keiji tai Toshiie! Tetorigawa ni musebu yuzurenu omoi!

5.pT: Seigan no kokuin! Dokuganryuu tai gunshin hitotoribashi no taiji!

6.pT: Kyoui no Toyotomi Moori doumei! Unabara o saku wa no gouken!!

7.pT: Sainantan-Satsuma no Chi e! Yukimura, Aratanaru Otoko no Deai!

8.pT: Tomogaki to no Kanashiki Saikai Môshû Kizamareshi Hi no Kioku!

9.pT: Ryû to Oni Owari no Gekitotsu! Bakusô! Date-Chôsokabe Rengô Gun!!

10.pT: Fukkatsu no Wakaki Tora! Kaizô Daiyôsai-Nichirin no Kyôi, Higashi e!!

11.pT: Hasô Toyotomi Daihontai! Honki no Keiji, Danchô no Battô!!

12.pT: Sôkô Kesshisen! Gekitô no Hate ni Fuku Kaze no Oto yo!!

13.pT: Ryûko, Itadaki no Chikai! Atsuki Mirai e Kakeru Tamashii!!
